titleStmt.title: The scorner rebuked, or, A reply to an atheistical libeller.
titleStmt.author: Field, John, 1652-1723.
Batt, Jasper, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Postscript on p. [1] at end signed: J. Batt.
Imperfect: tightly bound with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
